perlevel.eventCount: Number of player events in the given level
perlevel.southPoleScore: The score for the south pole placement
perlevel.northPoleScore: The score for the north pole placement
perlevel.northPoleToSouthGuess: The score for the south pole placement if the poles were switched.
perlevel.southPoleToNorthGuess: The score for the north pole placement if the poles were switched.
perlevel.numberOfCompassesUsed: How many of the six compasses were placed before guessing
perlevel.usedMagneticFilm: Indicates whether the magnetic film was placed
perlevel.usedIronFilings: Indicates whether the iron filings were placed
perlevel.numTimesPolesMoved: The number of times the poles were moved before finalizing the guess
perlevel.levelTime: The amount of time spent in the level

aggregate.sessionID: The player's session ID number for this play session
aggregate.persistentSessionID: The session ID for the player's device, persists across multiple players using the same device.
aggregate.sessionEventCount: The total number of events across the entire session
aggregate.sessionTime: The total number of seconds spent
aggregate.numberOfCompletePlays: The number of times the player played the game
aggregate.averageScore: The average score across all complete plays
